parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the resource. This parameter is valid only when the TagKey.N parameter is not specified. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   instance: ECS instance
*   disk: disk
*   snapshot: snapshot
*   image: image
*   securitygroup: security group
*   volume: storage volume
*   eni: elastic network interface (ENI)
*   ddh: dedicated host
*   ddhcluster: dedicated host cluster
*   keypair: SSH key pair
*   launchtemplate: launch template
*   reservedinstance: reserved instance
*   snapshotpolicy: automatic snapshot policy
*   elasticityassurance: elasticity assurance
*   capacityreservation: capacity reservation

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The tag keys of the resource.
